sourcesContent:
import { Box, Typography, Button, useTheme } from '@mui/material'
import Logo from '../assets/logo.png'
import ExpandMoreIcon from '@mui/icons-material/ExpandMore'

const Hero = () => {
  const theme = useTheme()

  return (
    <Box
      id="home"
      sx={{
        height: '100vh',
        backgroundColor: '#C5B0CD',
        color: '#17313E',
        display: 'flex',
        flexDirection: 'column',
        justifyContent: 'center',
        alignItems: 'center',
        textAlign: 'center',
        px: 4,
        py: 6,
      }}
    >
      <Box
        component="img"
        src={Logo}
        alt="Odyssey Logo"
        sx={{
          width: { xs: 120, sm: 180, md: 220 },
          mb: 3,
          borderRadius: '12px',
        }}
      />
      <Typography
        variant="h2"
        fontWeight="bold"
        sx={{ fontSize: { xs: '2rem', sm: '3rem', md: '3.5rem' } }}
      >
        Odyssey of Wisdom
      </Typography>
      <Typography
        variant="h6"
        mt={2}
        maxWidth="sm"
        sx={{ color: '#17313E', opacity: 0.9 }}
      >
        Youth association connecting Greek youth with Erasmus+ opportunities for travel, learning, and cultural exchange across Europe.
      </Typography>
      <Button
        endIcon={<ExpandMoreIcon />}
        variant="contained"
        size="medium"
        sx={{
          mt: 5,
          textTransform: 'none',
          backgroundColor: '#415E72',
          color: 'white',
          px: 4,
          py: 1.5,
          borderRadius: '20px',
          fontWeight: 500,
          '&:hover': { backgroundColor: '#17313E' },
        }}
        onClick={() => document.getElementById('about').scrollIntoView({ behavior: 'smooth' })}
      >
        Learn more
      </Button>
    </Box>
  )
}

export default Hero
